entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Laurentides (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
